TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ProfileMigrateEventHandler(object sender, ProfileMigrateEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed ProfileMigrateEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ProfileMigrateEventHandler(sender As Object, e As ProfileMigrateEventArgs)
public delegate void ProfileMigrateEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ProfileMigrateEventArgs ^ e);
type ProfileMigrateEventHandler = delegate of obj * ProfileMigrateEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将处理 类的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于定义委托事件的类。The delegate is defined for the event of the class. 您可以访问事件的类在 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中，如本主题的示例中所示。You can access the event of the class in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application as shown in the example for this topic. 可以使用事件将配置文件属性值从一个匿名配置文件到经过身份验证配置文件以匿名方式使用你的应用程序的人登录时。You can use the event to copy profile property values from an anonymous profile to an authenticated profile when someone who has been anonymously using your application logs in. ASP.NET 具有启用了用户配置文件的应用程序启动时，创建新的类的类型`ProfileCommon`，后者又继承类。When an application that has the user profile enabled is started, ASP.NET creates a new class of type `ProfileCommon`, which inherits from the class. 当`ProfileCommon`生成类，基于 Web.config 文件中指定的配置文件属性`GetProfile`方法将添加可用于检索`ProfileCommon`对象基于用户名称。When the `ProfileCommon` class is generated, based on the profile properties specified in the Web.config file, a `GetProfile` method is added that enables you to retrieve a `ProfileCommon` object based on a user name. 可以使用`GetProfile`要检索的匿名配置文件的属性值的当前配置文件的方法。You can use the `GetProfile` method of the current profile to retrieve the property values of the anonymous profile. 然后可以将匿名属性值复制到经过身份验证的用户的当前配置文件。The anonymous property values can then be copied to the current profile for the authenticated user. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示启用匿名身份验证的 Web.config 文件和ASP.NET 应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中包含的事件。The following code examples show a Web.config file that enables anonymous authentication and the event included in the Global.asax file for an ASP.NET application. 下面的代码示例显示启用匿名标识的 Web.config 文件和支持匿名用户的配置文件属性。The following code example shows a Web.config file that enables anonymous identification and profile properties that support anonymous users. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示ASP.NET 应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中包含的事件。The following code example shows the event included in the Global.asax file for an ASP.NET application. 事件将配置文件属性值从匿名配置文件复制到当前用户的配置文件。The event copies profile property values from the anonymous profile to the profile for the current user. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager/VB/global.asax#1)]
